name: OperationsFlightstatusRouteDateByOriginAndDestinationGet
description: Status of flights between a given origin and destination on a given date.

date.description: Departure date (YYYY-MM-DD) in local time of departure airport

Accept.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

limit.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

offset.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
